errors.error_description: The description for the `test` task provides an incorrect command `poe run test`. The correct syntax is simply `poe test`.
correction_candidates: The correct command is `poetry run test`.
The correct command is `poetry run pytest`.

errors.error_description: The command to activate the virtual environment has an incorrect path; it uses `venv/bin/activate` instead of the correct `.venv/bin/activate`, as poetry creates the virtual environment directory with a leading dot.
